turns.utterance: I love the  Appalachian Trail - it's around  2,200 miles  and is beautiful!
turns.response: I've never been but I wouldn't mind going one day!

turns.utterance: What I love about it is that it goes through many states, including Georgia, North Carolina, Tennessee, Virginia, and lots more!  So much lovely scenery!
turns.response: What kind of wildlife is there?

turns.utterance: There's foxes and raccoons!  At least 2 million people hike on at least part of the trail every year!
turns.response: Wow I bet its really good exercise.

turns.utterance: It sure is!  Interestingly, it was in 1921 when the idea of creating the Appalachian Trail first came about
turns.response: Really? Who thought of the idea?

phrase: i am too old to hike i am in my seventies.
at least 2 million people hike on at least part of the trail every year!
